description_html: Casali presents the Hybrid Collection’s new curved door in orange glass decorated with Mac Stopa’s Hybrid Collection Mesh pattern in earthy colors using Casali’s new ink technology and finished in transparent lacquer, creating a spherical 3D effect and futuristic vibe. The Mesh pattern is available on curved glass and straight glass, on sliding and swing doors, single doors and French doors, using 10 mm extra-clear glass in multiple color combinations producing a multitude of artistic expressions. Made in Italy.
product_name: Hybrid Collection Doors with Mesh Pattern by Mac Stopa for Casali
